name: Nokia Pong
description:
This game is a simple pong clone .  Is this all there is to it? You gonna have to play it to discover.

Make 3 points to win the game!


Controls: 

  • move: WASD / arrow keys
  • action: Space bar / Enter

Made for Nokia 3310 Jam 3

https://itch.io/jam/nokiajam3

fonts: Efforts Pro by @somepx

sfx: nokia 3310 soundpack by Trix @Trixelized
